note.p: Scottish farmer. Farmed at Blervie, Rafford, Morayshire, from at least 1863 to at least 1871.
Census returns of Scotland 1871 (The National Archives of Scotland: Rafford 2/10)
Correspondence vol. 16, letter from J. B. Innes, 7 December 1868
Local Heritage Services in Moray (libindx.moray.gov.uk, accessed 4 December 2019)
Scotland old parish registers births 120/10 310 Ardclach (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 4 December 2019)
